metadata.title: CVE-2023-52655 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: aqc111: check packet for fixup for true limitIf a device sends a packet that is inbetween 0and sizeof(u64) the value passed to skb_trim()as length will wrap around ending up as some verylarge value.The driver will then proceed to parse the headerlocated at that position, which will either oops orprocess some random value.The fix is to check against sizeof(u64) rather than0, which the driver currently does. The issue existssince the introduction of the driver.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
